name: Visit the devil's pailon
description: El Pailón del Diablo is a place for nature and hiking lovers. There you will find an impressive waterfall with stone paths, Tibetan bridges and a tree house. It is known as a tourist icon of Ecuador.

name: Go to Animal Park and the slide
description: AnimalPark is a Naturally Fun Theme Park, offering unique and unforgettable experiences where you have the opportunity to interact with all the animals and live in harmony with nature. You will also find the longest slide in Latin America.

name: Visit the tree house and the swing at the End of the World
location: Street Pastaza, and, Baños de Agua Santa, Ecuador
description: The tree house is without a doubt one of the most visited places in Baños de Agua Santa, there you can appreciate an incredible landscape with the view of the Tungurahua volcano and take incredible photos.

name: Ride on an Extreme Swing
description: If you are a fan of extreme sports, I recommend you ride an extreme swing. You will have the sensation of flying over the city and seeing an incredible landscape at a great height. Depending on the swing, it can measure from 20 to 30 meters. They are located at an altitude of 2,600 meters from the city of Baños.

name: Get to know the hands of Pachamama
description: It is an incredible viewing point and is 25 metres long. It is a true work of art dedicated to exalting men and women, nature and the productivity of the earth.

name: Visit the Viewpoint of the Hands of God
description: They are 2 impressive hands that emerge from the top of a spectacular viewpoint to support a wooden bridge, from which you can enjoy impressive landscapes of the city of Baños with the Tungurahua volcano as a witness.

name: Riding a rumba Chiva
time: Friday to Sunday and opening hours start at 4:00 pm.
description: If you like partying and rumba, chivas are the perfect plan, they will take you to visit several tourist places while you have fun along the way.

name: Go to the Magic Village or the Elf House
description: The Magic Village is a cozy garden and museum dedicated to the world of elves. The tour is self-guided along interpretive trails where visitors can read and learn. Inside is the art shop “La Casa Del Duende” which is a very magical place.

name: Go to the Enchanted Forest
description: The Enchanted Forest is the only Theme Park that is in the city center, 5 minutes from the central church. In this place you will be part of a magical tale, you will go through different platforms where you will meet fairies, elves, trolls, witches, king and queen, etc. You can also request different costumes and accessories so you can become a queen, a magic king or a witch. And you will find different spots where you can take incredible photos.

name: San Martin Zoo
description: If you are an animal lover, this place is perfect for you. It is the perfect plan to spend a wonderful weekend with your family, friends or as a couple. One of the zoo's objectives is animal rescue and rescued animals such as the condor, the emblematic bird of Ecuador.

name: The Waterfall Route
description: The Waterfall Route in Baños is recognized as one of the most important tourist attractions in Ecuador. This route is named after the Pastaza Corridor, because it has a series of waterfalls that create impressive landscapes and are the center of attention for tourists. It also has ecological trails and hanging bridges. You will see more than 60 waterfalls.

name: Go to Dinosaur Park
description: At Dinosaurios Park you can enjoy outdoor Dinosaur Trails and in a jungle environment you can see static life-size dinosaurs (around 700 meters). Carnotaurus, triceratops, velociraptor and much more. You will find museums, a live show with dinosaurs (robots), you can enter through the mouth and see face to face the 6-meter-long T-Rex that not only moves, it walks.

name: Visit the glass bridge over the white river
description: It is a suspension bridge over a river, but it is not all made of glass (only part of it). It has a very nice panoramic view, but it is not the best plan we have done. It is a very expensive plan for so little, I do not recommend it, but I leave you the option in case you want to go. In the same place you will find canopy and Tibetan bridges that are worth it.

name: Visit the Virgin's hot springs
description: This incredible place has sulphated hot springs, they have more than 8 pools and each one of them has different temperatures. You can also bathe at the foot of the Virgin waterfall, surrounded by nature where you can breathe fresh air. It is a place to spend time with family and friends.

name: Go and buy sweets at the Dulcería la Selecta
description: If you like souvenirs and sweets, this place is perfect. It is the largest candy store in all of Baños and they have affordable prices. In the same candy store you can watch the process of how guava sweets (snacks) are made and taste them.
